queries.query: CREATE TABLE d_m${localChannelId} ( id bigint NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, server_id character varying(36), received_date timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, processed boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE, import_id bigint, import_channel_id character varying(36) )
CREATE INDEX d_m${localChannelId}_index2 ON d_m${localChannelId}(id, received_date, processed)

CREATE TABLE d_mm${localChannelId} ( id integer NOT NULL, message_id bigint NOT NULL REFERENCES d_m${localChannelId}(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, received_date timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, status character(1) NOT NULL, connector_name character varying(256), send_attempts integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, send_date timestamp, response_date timestamp, error_code integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, chain_id integer NOT NULL, order_id integer NOT NULL, constraint mm${localChannelId}_pkey PRIMARY KEY(message_id, id) )
CREATE INDEX d_mm${localChannelId}_index2 ON d_mm${localChannelId}(message_id, id)
CREATE INDEX d_mm${localChannelId}_index3 ON d_mm${localChannelId}(message_id, status)
CREATE INDEX d_mm${localChannelId}_index4 ON d_mm${localChannelId}(message_id, id, status)

CREATE TABLE d_mc${localChannelId} ( metadata_id integer NOT NULL, message_id bigint NOT NULL, content_type integer NOT NULL, content clob, is_encrypted boolean NOT NULL, data_type character varying(255), CONSTRAINT mc${localChannelId}_PKEY PRIMARY KEY(message_id, metadata_id, content_type), CONSTRAINT mc${localChannelId}_FKEY FOREIGN KEY(message_id, metadata_id) REFERENCES d_mm${localChannelId}(message_id, id) ON DELETE CASCADE )
CREATE INDEX d_mc${localChannelId}_index2 ON d_mc${localChannelId}(message_id, metadata_id)
CREATE INDEX d_mc${localChannelId}_index3 ON d_mc${localChannelId}(message_id, metadata_id, content_type)

CREATE TABLE d_mcm${localChannelId} ( METADATA_ID integer NOT NULL, MESSAGE_ID bigint NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT mcm${localChannelId}_PKEY PRIMARY KEY(message_id, metadata_id), CONSTRAINT mcm${localChannelId}_FKEY FOREIGN KEY(message_id, metadata_id) REFERENCES d_mm${localChannelId}(message_id, id) ON DELETE CASCADE )
CREATE INDEX d_mcm${localChannelId}_index2 ON d_mcm${localChannelId}(message_id, metadata_id)

CREATE TABLE d_ma${localChannelId} ( id character varying(255) NOT NULL, message_id bigint NOT NULL REFERENCES d_m${localChannelId}(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, type character varying(40), segment_id integer NOT NULL, attachment_size integer NOT NULL, content blob )

CREATE TABLE d_ms${localChannelId} ( metadata_id integer, received bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, received_lifetime bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, filtered bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, filtered_lifetime bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, transformed bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, transformed_lifetime bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, pending bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, pending_lifetime bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, sent bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, sent_lifetime bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, error bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, error_lifetime bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 )
CREATE TABLE d_channels ( local_channel_id bigint NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, channel_id character varying(36) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT unique_channel_id UNIQUE (channel_id) )
CREATE TABLE d_message_sequences ( local_channel_id bigint NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, id bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 )
ALTER TABLE d_mcm${localChannelId} ADD COLUMN ${columnName} character varying(255)
ALTER TABLE d_mcm${localChannelId} ADD COLUMN ${columnName} decimal(31, 15)
ALTER TABLE d_mcm${localChannelId} ADD COLUMN ${columnName} boolean
ALTER TABLE d_mcm${localChannelId} ADD COLUMN ${columnName} timestamp

SELECT mm.*, m.server_id FROM d_mm${localChannelId} mm JOIN d_m${localChannelId} m ON m.id = mm.message_id WHERE mm.id = ? and mm.status = ? ORDER BY m.id OFFSET ${offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST ${limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT mm.*, m.server_id FROM d_mm${localChannelId} mm JOIN d_m${localChannelId} m ON m.id = mm.message_id WHERE mm.id = ? AND mm.status = ? AND m.id >= ? AND m.id <= ? ORDER BY m.id OFFSET ${offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST ${limit} ROWS ONLY
